items.name: vulnerability 001
items.description: The vulnerability was detected in the remote SSH server
items.recommendation: Apply security update 2021-04-01 to all affected systems.

items.name: vulnerability 002
items.description: Remote code execution vulnerabilities were discovered in software running on the server
items.recommendation: Upgrade the affected applications to their latest version to resolve the issue.

items.name: vulnerability 003
items.description: The system appears to be exposing non-personally identifiable information about its users.
items.recommendation: Configure the system to stop showing the sensitive information, or configure proper authentication and authorization controls are in place for accessing the sensitive information.

items.name: vulnerability 004
items.description: An information exposure vulnerability exists on the remote system, the scanner detected NGINX v2.0.1 running on the host.
items.recommendation: Configure the system to remove the HTTP header: `Server` from all responses.

items.name: vulnerability 005
items.description: The vulnerability was detected in the remote SSH server
items.recommendation: Apply security update 2021-04-01 to all affected systems.
